creator: Plejd AB
descriptionHtml: Control and manage your Plejd home setup.
descriptionShort: Control and manage your Plejd home setup.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We are continuously making improvements and adding features. To make sure you don’t miss anything, get the latest version of Plejd.

- Do you control non-light products with our relay devices and want them to automatically shut off after a while? Why not try our new Timer feature!
- Wish you could use your Android device to control your lights even quicker? Well, if you have a Plejd gateway, look no further: add our new widget directly to your home screen, today!

title: Plejd

creator: Plejd AB
descriptionHtml: Control and manage your Plejd home setup.
descriptionShort: Control and manage your Plejd home setup.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We are continuously making improvements and adding features. To make sure you don’t miss anything, get the latest version of Plejd.

- Afraid of the dark? Don't worry, Night Mode is here to protect you from the monsters under your bed! You can now dim the lights in your astro event during the night instead of turning them off.
- Hosting a late (socially-distanced) party? Weekend Mode can help you to keep your astro event on for a bit longer during Fridays and Saturdays!

title: Plejd

creator: Plejd AB
descriptionHtml:
Get the most out of your Plejd products! The Plejd app allows you to control and manage your Plejd home setup easily. Our powerful yet simple app is a complement to the traditional light switch. It is a simple tool for configuring and controlling the lighting in your home.

Scenes
Using the app, you can easily create scenes to suit your needs. These scenes are activated from the app or your usual light switches. Turn off all the lights in your home from the light switch in the hallway when you leave for work, or use the app to start the movie night scene from the comfort of your couch.

Time functions
With Plejd, you can schedule your lighting to a specific time of day or based on the sunrise and sunset. Automatically turn on the outdoor lighting when the sun sets and off when the sun rises. All our products have built-in astro/time schedules.

Vacation mode
Let the vacation mode turn on, turn off or dim your lights automatically when you are away from home. Mimic the behavior of someone being home, relax, and enjoy your vacation.

Gateway features
With our Gateway, you can control your lighting remotely and use vacation mode. You can also enable integration with third-party systems and, by doing so, enable voice control.

Widget
With a Gateway in your system, you can add our widget to your smartphone for easy scene control.
descriptionShort: Control and manage your Plejd system.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We are continuously making improvements and adding features. To make sure you don’t miss anything, get the latest version of Plejd.

- Some minor bug fixes and stability improvements.

descriptionShort: Control and manage your Plejd system.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We are continuously making improvements and adding features. To make sure you don’t miss anything, get the latest version of Plejd.

- LED75 is now fully supported in the system.
- And as usual, some annoying bugs have been fixed.

We are continuously making improvements and adding features. To make sure you don’t miss anything, get the latest version of Plejd.

creator: Plejd AB
descriptionHtml:
Get the most out of your Plejd products! The Plejd app allows you to control and manage your Plejd home setup easily. Our powerful yet simple app is a complement to the traditional light switch. It is a simple tool for configuring and controlling the lighting in your home.

Scenes
Using the app, you can easily create scenes to suit your needs. These scenes are activated from the app or your usual light switches. Turn off all the lights in your home from the light switch in the hallway when you leave for work, or use the app to start the movie night scene from the comfort of your couch.

Time functions
With Plejd, you can schedule your lighting to a specific time of day or based on the sunrise and sunset. Automatically turn on the outdoor lighting when the sun sets and off when the sun rises. All our products have built-in astro/time schedules.

Vacation mode
Let the vacation mode turn on, turn off or dim your lights automatically when you are away from home. Mimic the behavior of someone being home, relax, and enjoy your vacation.

Gateway features
With our Gateway, you can control your lighting remotely and use vacation mode. You can also enable integration with third-party systems and, by doing so, enable voice control.

Widget
With a Gateway in your system, you can add our widget to your smartphone for easy scene control.
descriptionShort: Control and manage your Plejd system.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We are continuously making improvements and adding features. To make sure you don’t miss anything, get the latest version of Plejd.


- Added support for our new light fixtures.
- Experience a refreshed and modernized user interface with an updated visual design, making it easier and more enjoyable to navigate and use the app.

Bug fixes and stability improvements in this update. Enjoy a smoother experience with fewer hiccups!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We are continuously making improvements and adding features. To make sure you don’t miss anything, get the latest version of Plejd.

Too lazy to click buttons? Our new motion sensor, WMS-01, will lighten your burden. Now you can Plejd outside too with our latest addition, OUT-01. Check them both out!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We are continuously making improvements and adding features. To make sure you don’t miss anything, get the latest version of Plejd.

- Alexa support.
- Improvements to Dim to warm mode.
- General bug fixes and performance improvements.

title:
Plejd
5.3.0

creator: Plejd AB
descriptionHtml:
Get the most out of your Plejd products! The Plejd app allows you to easily control and manage your setup. It’s a powerful and user-friendly tool that gives you access to all your products' smart features.

Scenes
Using the app, you can easily create scenes to suit your varied needs. These scenes are then activated either from the app or your regular light switches.

Scheduling
With the app, you can schedule your Plejd products to automatically adjust or turn on and off at specific times or with sunrise and sunset. Easily create and configure schedules and timers to suit your needs.

Gateway features
Gateway lets you control your Plejd system remotely over the Internet and use vacation mode. It also enables integrations with third-party services and, with that, voice control.

Vacation mode
Vacation mode mimics the behavior of someone being at home by automatically dimming lights and adjusting or turning products on and off when you are away. Enable the feature, relax, and enjoy your vacation.
descriptionShort: Control and manage your Plejd system.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We are continuously making improvements and adding features. To make sure you don’t miss anything, get the latest version of Plejd.

Bug fixes and performance improvements in our latest update! Update now for a smoother experience.
